casebody.data:
Anthony MEEKS, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS DIRECTOR, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159551
COA: 347871 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 16, 2019 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
